textContent:
With Gil, present. Eyes. Heart. Mind. 

A relationship with myself is how I treat other selves... By listening I am binding my soul and theirs. By seeing in their eyes I'm binding us. Yet right now I show up only as me. Myself. My needs. My emotions. My reactions. Seperating myself from everyone around me, especially Gil and Ben. By coming back to center, to groundedness, alignment, I come back to universal love with all selves. 

What is my relationship with myself? 

Is it fear? Fear of being liked, loved, accepted, interesting, smart, funny, friendly, polite, present, enough? 

Am I liked? --> liking me is liking you. We are from the same energy and universe
Am I interesting? --> is a flame hot? 
Am I funny? 

Is it love? How do I define my securities clearer than my insecurititie? Is my relationship one of love? Of energy, feelings,  thoughts, experiences, sensations? Of what? Of me? 

What is behind my relationship with Gil?
With Ben? Winston? Mom & Dad? Family? Friends? Dog? Coworkers? Work? Neighbors? Community? Strangers?
title: Questions
textContentHtml:
With Gil, present. Eyes. Heart. Mind. 


A relationship with myself is how I treat other selves... By listening I am binding my soul and theirs. By seeing in their eyes I'm binding us. Yet right now I show up only as me. Myself. My needs. My emotions. My reactions. Seperating myself from everyone around me, especially Gil and Ben. By coming back to center, to groundedness, alignment, I come back to universal love with all selves. 


What is my relationship with myself? 


Is it fear? Fear of being liked, loved, accepted, interesting, smart, funny, friendly, polite, present, enough? 


Am I liked? --> liking me is liking you. We are from the same energy and universe

Am I interesting? --> is a flame hot? 

Am I funny? 


Is it love? How do I define my securities clearer than my insecurititie? Is my relationship one of love? Of energy, feelings,  thoughts, experiences, sensations? Of what? Of me? 


What is behind my relationship with Gil?

With Ben? Winston? Mom & Dad? Family? Friends? Dog? Coworkers? Work? Neighbors? Community? Strangers?
